keyMoments.title: Zoro Battles Ohm
keyMoments.description: Zoro confronts the priest Ohm at the Upper Ruins as part of the Straw Hats' journey through Upper Yard.
keyMoments.significance: Continues the Straw Hats' struggle against Enel's forces.

keyMoments.title: Nami Swallowed by Nola
keyMoments.description: Nami is swallowed by the giant python Nola along with allies, placing her in extreme danger.
keyMoments.significance: Separates crew members and creates a crisis situation requiring eventual rescue and reunion.

keyMoments.title: Going Merry Secured at Meeting Point
keyMoments.description: Thanks to Pagaya and Conis, the Going Merry is safely delivered to the meeting point, ready for the crew's eventual departure.
keyMoments.significance: Ensures the crew has a ship ready for escape once they complete their mission.

ships.description: The Straw Hats' first ship, currently being watched over by Pagaya and Conis at the meeting point.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Ohm Guards the Upper Ruins
keyMoments.description: Priest Ohm confronts intruders at the Upper Ruins, enforcing the Ordeal of Iron.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates God's Army's control over Upper Yard and their role in eliminating threats to Enel's rule.

keyMoments.title: Ohm Defeats Multiple Warriors
keyMoments.description: Ohm successfully defeats both Zoro and Wyper, maintaining the 0% survival rate of the Ordeal of Iron.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the formidable power of Enel's priests and their effectiveness in defending Upper Yard.

keyMoments.title: Enel Monitors the Battles
keyMoments.description: Enel observes all events at the Upper Ruins from God's Shrine using his Mantra.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Enel's omniscient control and his role as the mastermind behind God's Army.

bases.description: Enel's headquarters atop Upper Yard from which he monitors and controls Skypiea.

keyMoments.title: Wyper Battles Ohm
keyMoments.description: Wyper confronts the priest Ohm at the Upper Ruins as part of the Shandia's effort to reclaim their homeland.
keyMoments.significance: Continues the 400-year war between the Shandia and the rulers of Skypiea.

keyMoments.title: Wyper Uses Burn Bazooka
keyMoments.description: Wyper demonstrates the Shandia's powerful dial-based weaponry with his Burn Bazooka.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the advanced technology and fighting capability of the Shandian warriors.

keyMoments.title: Wyper Defeated by Ohm
keyMoments.description: Wyper is knocked out by Ohm's Iron Cloud sword attack.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even the strongest Shandian warrior faces overwhelming opposition from Enel's priests.
